Name: Exquisite Ghorpse Story
About the game: Sit around the campfire with your friends and assemble a spooky ghost story. Was it an eldritch cult or the living dead causing trouble for the local townsfolk? Did the terror happen in a derelict gas station, or perhaps it was an abandoned carnival? And how did they meet their fate? A short, lighthearted piece of five minute interactive narrative from Jessica Harvey (Paratopic) and Kylie Backstrom, with music by Lazzie Brown (Paratopic/2019 IGF Excellence in Audio).
